item.description:
Sample top Bloody Mary recipeÂ submissions and select the one that will be crowned the official Bloody Mary Recipe of Fire Puncher Vodka!

Details on their website: http://www.grandten.com/bloody

RSVP to their eventbrite site: http://itsbloodytime.eventbrite.com/#

It's free, but register in advance with that link. Not sure if tickets will sell out, etc.

If you don't have a recipe to submit (I don't), then you are still invited to join in the shenanigans by tasting and voting for your favorite. If you do have a recipe to submit, then we'll cheer you on! (Maybe we can even collectively come up with a "Boston City Girls" recipe together to submit? Deadline for submissions: Oct 21. Submit to: bloody@grandten.com)

I've already signed up. Hopefully some other ladies want to join me!
item.name: It's Bloody Time! A Bloody Mary Recipe Competition
